name: Fire Alarm
description: This sample: constantly monitors for unsafe temperature levels, audibly notifies of alerts using the buzzer. Visually notifies of alerts using the LCD. Keeps track of fire alarm data, using cloud-based storage. Sends text messages to alert others of a possible fire.
author: Intel Corporation & Hybrid Group

hwreq: Grove LCD RGB Backlight on I2C
Grove Buzzer connected to digital pin 5 (Grove Base Shield Port D5)
Grove Temperature Sensor connected to analog pin 0 (Grove Base Shield Port A0)
